introduction: “Anis - The Companion” is the account of the life of Mirzá Muhammad 'Aliy-i-Zunuzi, known as Anis (close companion) who, together with the Báb, was martyred in Tabriz in the year 1850. This film brings to life the touching story of a young man who was transformed by faith, and having recognized the source of Divine Revelation, only sought to lay down his life for his beloved Master. Based on the beautiful work of Mr. R. Mehrabkhani from his book 'Zunuzi - A Love Story', this film brings to life the history of the Faith like never before.
